{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15994v1", "title": "The Excess Zero Graph of a Coxeter Group", "summary": "For a Coxeter group $W$ with length function $\ell$, the excess zero graph
$\mathcal{E}_0(W)$ has vertex set the non-identity involutions of $W$, with two
involutions $x$ and $y$ adjacent whenever $\ell(xy)=\ell(x)+\ell(y)$.
Properties of this graph such as connectivity, diameter and valencies of
certain vertices of $\mathcal{E}_0(W)$ are explored.", "main_category": "math.GR", "categories": "math.GR", "published": "2025-04-22T15:57:08Z"}
